\maketitle
\def\test#1#2#3#4#5{%
 \item[#1/#2/#3]#4 (#5):
 {\fontfamily{#1}\fontseries{#2}\fontshape{#3}\selectfont
 Animadversion for a giraffe costs \pounds123. Wa\ss\ ist
 das f\"ur ein Klopf?
 We are often na{\"\i}ve vis-\`{a}-vis
the d{\ae}monic ph{\oe}nix's official r\^{o}le in fluffy souffl\'{e}s}
}
